Workflow.Name: Visitor Registration - When a Visit Registration record is created
Workflow.Description: This cloud flow triggers when a visitor's registration record is created. It sends the appointment details and a PIN to the visitor, and the schedule to the host.

LocalizedName.description: Visitor Registration - When a Visit Registration record is created

Description.description: This cloud flow triggers when a visitor's registration record is created. It sends the appointment details and a PIN to the visitor, and the schedule to the host.
